function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information transparency during the initial phase of an outbreak","Impact":"Broadening the impact scope of the outbreak","Mitigation":"Enhance information transparency and timely communication","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, real-time communication tools","People":"Public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Delayed decision making and information disclosure during the early stages of an outbreak","Impact":"Ineffective risk communication and delayed response","Mitigation":"Improve decision-making processes and ensure timely information disclosure","Technologies":"Data analytics, communication technologies, decision support systems","People":"Public, healthcare professionals, government authorities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective risk communication associated with COVID-19","Impact":"Negative impact on public health preparedness and response","Mitigation":"Implement a message-centered approach and best practices for risk communication","Technologies":"Communication platforms, risk communication tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, government"}]}
